name: Texas Hot Wiener Sauce (Ulster County New York Style)
author: candyman63j
summary: The sauce was created in Ulster County, New York. The sauce turns a ordinary hot dog into a mouth-watering meal. The hot dog is served on a steamed bun with mustard, chopped onions and then the sauce. Enjoy.
ingredients: ½ (16 ounce) package hot dogs, coarsely chopped
1 pinch ground black pepper, or to taste
directions: Grind hot dogs into a chunky paste in a food processor and place into a large saucepan
Mix cornstarch with 1 cup water in a small bowl and set aside
Pour 7 more cups water over the hot dogs
Stir in vinegar, paprika, chili powder, sea salt, red pepper flakes, oregano, onion powder, cinnamon, white pepper, and black pepper and bring to a boil
Simmer over low heat until the sauce is slightly thickened, about 30 minutes
Gradually stir in reserved cornstarch mixture and simmer for 15 more minutes
Sauce will be thinner than chili and will thicken as it cools
